@jreback DO NOT MERGE. looks like i made a mistake when trying to fit on one line!

> @jreback DO NOT MERGE. looks like i made a mistake when trying to fit on one line!

false alarm! maybe the line breaks could have been chosen better.

> the regex is getting a bit unreadable.. this may suggest that a more (user friendly|consistent) error message should be raised by safe_sort?

yep might be better

ok to merge?
